article: I know of a "Nurse" that works in an environment that is stressful and painful. This is no _ nurse. She has strength, courage and confidence beyond the average and has the _ to cure those seeking to be cured. What makes this Nurse _ is that she did not receive her 19 _ in nursing or in trade school. This Nurse has been given her gifts and talents from a different source, a higher source, a higher power, a higher education. What makes this true story more _ is this Nurse does not work in a hospital or clinic. Lorena, a two-time cancer survivor and a young mom of three _ kids, could have chosen to rest and recover from her _ , stay home, and do nothing. Instead of _ drunk or worried, Lorena puts on her nurse suit, and 24 _ a support group, a group for cancer patients, for those _ a similar fight that she went through. Lorena could have _ there and would leave her armor and outfits on. Again, Lorena could have _ to stay home, however, she didn't stop there. Not letting her _ finances get in her way, Lorena would _ toy drives. Toy drives for the little souls that would not have received toys for Christmas _ . You see, Lorena 31 turns out a healer of pain, lifter of stress, enlightener of sadness, and a facilitator of hope. Lorena _ some of the pain of those undergoing treatment and letting them know there is hope, hope for a brighter future. Lorena relieved the sadness of those little kids _ if they would get a visit from Santa Claus. And Lorena is one for their _ . Lorena's work is not in a Hospital, her work is in the place we call _ . Thanks to her, we can say this world is a little better.
